author: î„œDuke Andy Atreides
content:
i WILL NEVER agree/support if malaysia has a space program. our people currently at a sad state. how can we manage a costly space program. better we invest in our public transportation, health, education and for new energy (solar/wind/wave). we can't rely on oil forever.

i WILL support space program when all the things i said just now already successfully achieved.

and surely hope to own a light saber before i died. hey! who don't want one..
